resources.string: We are a not just handicrafts dealer or the ones who deals in designer blue pottery, ravishing home decor, furniture and handcrafted leather bags but we are also conglomeration of ideas. The idea of using science for commerce of art. The idea of removing "middle men" from lives of artisans. The idea of learning the "karigari" on internet. The idea of reintroducing the "royal touch" in your life. The idea of delivering the real art of Indian handicrafts, pottery, furniture, home decor, leather bags, marble crafted antiques and many other artistic touch to every Indian.
